content: you start knitting the toe k 1 round of toe decreases k all st of the following 3 rounds k 1 round of toe decreases k all st of the following 2 rounds k 1 round of toe decreases k all st of the following 2 rounds k 1 round of toe decreases k all st of the following 1 round k 1 round of toe decreases k all st of the following 1 round k 1 round of toe decreases k all st of the following 1 round keep knitting rounds of toe decreases until there are 2 st left on each nld cut the yarn pull the thread through the remaining 8 st and tie it off tip finishing touch finish the remaing loose threads by weaving them in for an ultimate finishing touch you wash the socks in a wool-friendly detergent and let them dry flat any irregularities will be smoothed out very nicely this way it does make a difference especially when you want to give the socks as a gift it is worth while to invest in sock blockers in different sizes lots of knitting fun i wrote this pattern with love and attention and hope you will also have lots of fun knitting your own chicky lace socks if you have any questions or remarks please let me know by sending an email to paulien roggeveen@outlook com #chickylacesocks i love to see your version of chicky lace socks it would be super nice if you share your result on instagram using #chickylacesocks please feel free to tag my account @sokken_van_pien i can t wait sokken van pien email paulien roggeveen@outlook com instagram @sokken_van_pien take a look at https //www ravelry com/ etsyshop for patterns and hand knitted socks designers/pien-roggeveen for more inspiring patterns etsy com/nl/shop/sokkenvanpien ravelry for more inspiring patterns https //www ravelry com/designers/pien-roggeveen copyrights the pattern chicky lace socks and the used photo s belong to paulien roggeveen and are for personal use only april 2023
